mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, product_seq, mem_id, cate_code, product_subject, product_content, product_img1, product_img2, product_img3, product_img4, product_img5, to_char(product_price, 'FM99,999,999') ||'원' as product_price , product_location, product_condition , product_delivery_fee , product_hashtag1, product_hashtag2, product_hashtag3, product_hashtag4, product_hashtag5, product_view, product_manage , ROUND((sysdate-product_logtime)*24*60) as product_logtime FROM product WHERE product_manage=1 ORDER BY product_logtime asc ) WHERE rn BETWEEN nvl(#{start},0) AND nvl(#{end},20) ORDER BY product_logtime asc
